description: This session almost never took place. I've been asking Alexandre to appear unmasked for a while. He's so cute, I wanted everyone to see. But his girlfriend asked him to quit making porn scenes. He even deleted me from his Facebook friends. Then out of the blue, he sent me a friend's request and asked me if I was still interested. Of course I was. The athlete quit his girlfriend and has gained mass everywhere, in a good way. This was my chance to finally shoot him with no mask on.
title: Alexandre Unmasked
